title: Weekends in the country
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Hearing impaired
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/People with disabilities
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental health
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Rural conditions
description: Born in the country but forced to live in a hostel for the deaf in Melbourne from a very young age, William talks about his isolation, depression and separation from family. This is a tragic story reflecting the lack of facilities and support for the deaf in rural Victoria. With Auslan signing and subtitles.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000842; When deaf minds travel; Active; 2006
